attributes.action: Make sure the UK does not aid Donald Trump in a war he may start as president.
attributes.background: If Donald Trump becomes the President of the US he will probably start a war with someone so to avoid problems in the UK don't support him, as it might cause countries to turn against the UK.

rejection.details: It's not clear what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take. You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to cut all diplomatic ties with the USA if Donald Trump is elected.
